migrate-onecx-to-v6.description: Update package json to Angular 19, PrimeNG 19, OneCX versions to v6 and other dependencies to be compatible with Angular 19.

warn-for-translations-utils.description: Detects and warns for usage of the translations utilities removed from v6.

warn-for-removed-components.description: Detects and warns for usage of the removed components from v6.

warn-for-removed-utils.description: Detects and warns for usage of the removed utilities from v6.

replace-permission-checker.description: Detects and replaces imports for HasPermissionChecker, AlwaysGrantPermissionChecker and HAS_PERMISSION_CHECKER.
